article: the latest google pixel 3 rumors and leaks reveal more information about the upcoming android smartphone . they include photos of the pixel 3 clearly white variant , the pixel stand accessory , and the wireless charging feature . a series of new google pixel 3 leaks revealed photos of the upcoming smartphone 's clearly white variant , hinted at a dock accessory named the pixel stand , and all but confirmed that the device will finally receive a wireless charging google pixel 3 and pixel 3 xl , similar to their predecessors , will be verizon exclusives .

the smartphones are slated to be announced in october , and are expected to continue the pixel lineup 's run as the arguably the best android phones in the pixel 3 xl clearly white variantphotos of the clearly white variant of the google pixel 3 xl have been leaked by xda junior member , showing off the smartphone 's display notch , popularized by apple 's iphone x , dual front-facing cameras , and the dual-tone construction with a glossy top part and a matte bottom is doing away with the aluminum section for the pixel 3 xl , with an all-glass rear for the device .

the color of the smartphone in the leaked picture , however , is making the feature less new clearly white variant photo is the latest in a series of pixel 3 leaked images , all working together to confirm what to expect from the upcoming devices in terms of their stand for pixel 3 smartphonesgoogle has been pushing for a wider adoption of its google assistant ai and google home smart speakers , and it appears that the company will bring these technologies together with a dock for pixel 3 smartphones named the pixel discovered in the latest version of the google app mention a pixel stand , as well as the ability for pixel 3 smartphones to recognize it as an official dock .

according to the code strings , once users accept the pixel stand as a trusted dock , it will essentially transform the pixel 3 into a full-fledged smart speaker . google assistant may be called even while the device is 3 wireless chargingthe code that provided hints for the pixel stand also provided further confirmation that the pixel 3 new features will include wireless previous version of the google app from june revealed that a wireless charging dock codenamed `` dreamliner '' was in the works . neither the pixel nor pixel 2 support the feature , so it is expected that the wireless charging dock is for the pixel the discovery of the upcoming pixel stand , it is now believed that the dock will also be one that will enable the wireless charging feature for the pixel 3 .
abstract: New Google Pixel 3 Leaks : Photos Of White Variant , Pixel Stand , And Wireless Charging
